tradeinvestments.title: Trade finance
tradeinvestments.text-1: We help importing companies avoid 100% prepayment in settlements with suppliers and offer low-cost financing on short, medium and long-term basis.

slides.title: If you are an importer
arguments: there is no need to withdraw current assets
the opportunity to cooperate with suppliers on the most favorable terms and at the most favorable prices
no risks of non-shipment by the supplier of the goods when paying under the contract

slides.title: If you are an exporter
arguments: guarantee of payment for the shipped goods
increase in the volume of supplies
expansion of the client base due to more favorable terms of delivery and payment
